body_html:
So after reading all such blogs I decided to install python version 3.5 and 2.7 too. I was installing the tensorflow using conda installation as given here.

I installed it successfully but after installation when I went inside my python terminal and tested tensorflow it shows me this.

But after a while I thought of following this way which gave me an exception in the end.

But, now it runs tensorflow!

Bravo!
body_text:
So after reading all such blogs I decided to install python version 3.5 and 2.7 too. I was installing the tensorflow using conda installation as given here.

body:
So after reading all such blogs I decided to install python version 3.5 and 2.7 too. I was installing the tensorflow using conda installation as given here.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31855851/33348787-ae8620dc-d465-11e7-83fc-f6a954a11344.png)
I installed it successfully but after installation when I went inside my python terminal and tested tensorflow it shows me this.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31855851/33348934-13a13826-d466-11e7-94d6-4a2e72dfd657.png)

But after a while I thought of following this way which gave me an exception in the end.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31855851/33348966-32f707fa-d466-11e7-9b23-d47f84a5278d.png)

But, now it runs tensorflow!
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31855851/33349040-8d649dba-d466-11e7-8085-7f6ce92d214e.png)
Bravo!
